column3: > I don't see the value of these changes.\n\nI agree. I'm also not sure this is worth doing.

Alright - I thought these would be validated by `commit-script-check` at some point; I guess these are relaxed instructions.\n\nAs for `scripts` vs `script`, I thought it would help avoid misuses like https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/16653 (bitcoin's script language vs utility scripts)
Figured they should be ordered by simplicity.
